enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: JOINT MEETING OF THE SUBSIDIARY BODIES
sentences: SBSTA Chair Harald Dovland (Norway) opened the first joint resumed meeting of the subsidiary bodies.
He said the Chairs of contact groups held at SB-13 Part I would resume their tasks, and requested reports on recent consultations and workshops held since SB-13 Part I.
